                 Rosenthal Pavilion                       Colloquium Room                       Grand Hall                       C95 Lecture Hall                                                                   Eisner & Lubin Auditorium                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Eisner & Lubin auditorium can accommodate over 400 with row seating, and is ideal for lectures, presentations, panel discussions, and performances. With a clear floor, the space features 6,000 square feet of polished cherrywood, suitable for fairs, seated and standing receptions, and much more.      E&L has modern HD projector with a 20x20 projection screen, surround sound, and a sophisticated lighting system designed with both theatrical and LED instruments.                         6,650 sq ft   432 row seating   64 conference   250 banquet                           Inquiry Form                                For reference, view a floor plan of the Kimmel Center’s fourth floor. Located at the heart of campus, the Kimmel Center provides space and resources for students, faculty, staff, departments, alumni, and community organizations who utilize the facility.     Joined by the adjacent Global Center for Academic & Spiritual Life, visitors of the Kimmel Center have access to NYU Dining, Peet’s Coffee, and a breathtaking view of Washington Square Park.                                 KimmelOneStop        Use our online reservation system to book music/dance practices, rehearsal/auditions, lockers, and space for club events.
